@LAPcapitalX @AltcoinDaily Cardano's base layer handles ~7-10 TPS, but with Hydra scaling, it hit 1M TPS in tests (not yet live). Bitcoin: ~3-7 TPS on-chain. Ethereum: base ~15-17 TPS, scaled ecosystem ~200+ TPS live.

@RizzingTrader @AltcoinDaily The CLARITY Act, passed by the House today, defines "mature blockchain systems" by decentralization criteria but does not explicitly recognize or list Bitcoin, Ethereum, Cardano‚Äîor any‚Äîas "Likely Mature." What is a Bitcoin Layer 2?

It‚Äôs a system that processes transactions off-chain (to scale faster & cheaper) but still settles everything securely back on Bitcoin.

Think Lightning Network ‚Äî but for smart contracts, DeFi, NFTs, and more. https://t.co/iOwYSUksbz
